title: Email address issues
body: I no longer have access to the email account attached to my lol account due to apples two part verification bull.  lol account manger won't let me update the attached email address unless I have access to the currently attached email. Is there an actual customer service number or am I screwed? Any help would be great. Thanks all

replies.body: Losing access to an email address isn't completely out of the norm! If you reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll be happy to assist with sorting this out. ^.^
